scripts.setup: npm install && pip install -r requirements.txt && npm run migrate && ./manage.py loaddata sites && npm run createsuperuser
scripts.startover: ls ./KeyManager.db &> /dev/null && rm -rf KeyManager.db && npm run clean
scripts.prune: rm -rf static/dist && mkdir -p static/dist/js && mkdir -p static/dist/css && mkdir -p static/dist/images
scripts.build:js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] -t envify -o static/dist/js/site.js static/src/js/index.js
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:js && npm run optimize:css
scripts.watch:js: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] -t envify static/src/js/index.js -o 'exorcist static/dist/js/site.js.map > static/dist/js/site.js' -dv
scripts.build: npm run prune && concurrently "npm run build:js" "npm run build:css" "npm run copy:images" && npm run optimize
scripts.watch: npm run prune && npm run copy:images && npm run build:css && concurrently --raw "npm run watch:lint" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css"
scripts.KeyManager:browser-sync: browser-sync start --no-open --proxy localhost:8000 --files "static/dist/chosen/*.js, static/dist/chosen/*.css, static/dist/js/*.js, static/dist/css/*.css"
scripts.KeyManager: concurrently --raw "./manage.py runserver" "npm run KeyManager:browser-sync" "npm run watch"
scripts.compile: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && concurrently "npm run copy:images" "npm run build:js" "npm run build:css"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run compile && npm run optimize
